thread.title: Paul Griffiths

author: Paul Griffiths
title: Paul Griffiths
text: I ordered flowers for St Petersburg, same day delivery. Florist was unable to contact the recipient at first, but ultimately they did manage to deliver the same day, and corrected the number of flowers to make sure an odd number was delivered (important for Russia). It was really great service and I was very pleased, I wouldn't hesitate to use FloraQueen again!
